amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of Defense to establish a Department of Defense-wide Ombudsman Office within the Office of the Secretary of Defense.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 110-78 to.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bilirakis amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Bilirakis.
